title: [Geology] A global team of scientists shows our pre-COVID-19 commute was causing small earthquakes that have mostly vanished now [Science Magazine - "Global quieting of high-frequency seismic noise due to COVID-19 pandemic lockdown measures"]

[Environment] Global COVID-19 ''lockdown'' measures - the quarantines, physical isolation, travel restrictions and widespread closures of services and industry that countries around the world have implemented in 2020 - resulted in a months-long reduction in global seismic noise by up to 50%
